constexpr std::chrono::year&amp; operator++() noexcept;
}}

constexpr std::chrono::year operator++( int ) noexcept;
}}

Adds or subtracts 1 from the year value.
@1,2@ Performs {{c|1=*this += std::chrono::years{1};}}.
@3,4@ Performs {{c|1=*this -= std::chrono::years{1};}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1,3@ A reference to this {{tt|year}} after modification.
@2,4@ A copy of the {{tt|year}} made before modification.

===Notes===
If the result would be outside the range {{closed range|-32767|32767}}, the actual stored value is unspecified.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    std::chrono::year y{2020};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (++y == std::chrono::year(2021)) &lt;&lt; ' ';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (--y == std::chrono::year(2020)) &lt;&lt; '\n';

    using namespace std::literals::chrono_literals;
    y = 32767y;
    y++; //← unspecified, see ↑ Notes ↑
    std::cout &lt;&lt; static_cast&lt;int&gt;(y) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
true true
-32768
}}
